modName: Temple Priest Robes HD Retexture - Reclamation Robes
summary: HD Retexture for the Temple Priest robes and hood
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i66.tinypic.com/2a5mbyo.jpg[/img]

[size=4][i]DRAGONBORN REQUIRED[/i][/size]

[youtube]zRUHl_yOq28[/youtube]
Thanks to Hodilton for the video.

On the robes are placed the symbol of Azura, Mephala and Boethiah taken from the Temple's shrines.
On the robes are written with Daedric alphabet "Reclamation".
On the hood are written with Daedric alphabet "Azura Mephala Boethiah"

Textures taken from the official High Resolution Texture Pack
RESOLUTION:

Robes:2048x2048
Hood:2048x2048[/center]


Install:

NMM: Download with NMM.

MANUAL: Put the texture folder inside the Skyrim/Data folder.


All credits to Bethesda

Enjoy and FUS RO DAH!

Rafuel
